Text: Hoda Kotb ( ; Arabic: هدى قطب‎ ‎  "Hudā Quṭb" ] , born August 9, 1964) is an American television news anchor and TV host known as the co-host of NBC's "Today Show"' s fourth hour with Kathie Lee Gifford.
